name: Lifestyle
footer:
Resources used for this survey:
 * Tobacco Use Supplement to the Current Population Survey (TUS‑CPS)
 * American Thoracic Society Division of Lung Disease questionnaire (ATS ‑ DLD ‑ 78)
 * Million Veterans Program
 * Prostate, Lung, Colorectal, and Ovarian (PLCO) Cancer Screening Trial
 * Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH)
 * National Epidemiologic Survey on Alcohol and Related Conditions (NESARC)
 * Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test (AUDIT‑C)
 * NM ASSIST (NIDA-Modified Alcohol, Smoking, and Substance Involvement Screening Test)

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyleIntro
elements.html: This survey asks questions about your lifestyle. This is to better understand how it may affect health. It will take about 5-10 minutes to answer these questions. Please answer each question as honestly as possible. We are looking for your own answers, not what you think your doctors, family, or friends want you to say. Do not feel like you have to spend a long time on each question. The first answer that comes to you is usually the best one.

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyleVigorousActivityIntro
elements.html:
Vigorous Activity

Vigorous physical activities refer to activities that take hard physical effort and make you breathe much harder than normal. Think only about those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time.

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_daysVigorousActivity
elements.title: During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do vigorous physical activities like heavy lifting, digging, aerobics, or fast bicycling?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_vigorousActivityMinutes
elements.title: How many minutes did you usually spend doing vigorous physical activities on one of those days?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyleModertateActivityIntro
elements.html:
Moderate Activity

Moderate physical activities refer to activities that take moderate physical effort and make you breathe somewhat harder than normal. Think only about those physical activities that you did for at least 10 minutes at a time.

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_daysModerateActivities
elements.title: During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do moderate physical activities like carrying light loads, bicycling at a regular pace, or doubles tennis? Please do not include walking.

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_moderateActivityMinutes
elements.title: How many minutes did you usually spend doing moderate physical activities on one of those days?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyleWalkingIntro
elements.html:
Walking

Think about the time you spent walking in the last 7 days. This includes at work and at home, walking to travel from place to place, and any other walking that you have done solely for recreation, sport, exercise, or leisure.

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_daysWalking
elements.title: During the last 7 days, on how many days did you walk for at least 10 minutes at a time?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_minutesWalking
elements.title: How many minutes did you usually spend doing walking on one of those days?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyleSittingIntro
elements.html:
Sitting

Think about the time you spent sitting in the last 7 days. Include time spent at work, at home, while doing course work, and during leisure time. This may include time spent sitting at a desk, visiting friends, reading, or sitting/lying down to watch television.

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_timeSitting
elements.title: During the last 7 days, how much time did you spend sitting on a weekday?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyleSmokingIntro
elements.html:
Smoking Habits

The next questions will ask about your smoking habits, including cigarettes, bidis, electronic nicotine products, hookah/shisha, and paan with tobacco products. This will help researchers better understand how smoking affects health. As always, your answers are private.

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_smoke100cigs
elements.title: Have you ever smoked the equivalent of at least 100 cigarettes in your life? Including bidis, hookah, or other forms of smoking? (There are 20 cigarettes in a pack.)

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_smokingDays
elements.title: Do you now smoke cigarettes every day, some days, or not at all?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_ageSmokingStart
elements.title: How old were you when you first started regular cigarette smoking?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_attemptQuit
elements.title: In the past, have you ever made a serious attempt to quit smoking? That is, have you stopped smoking for at least one day or longer because you were trying to quit?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_ageSmokingQuit
elements.title: If you have completely stopped smoking cigarettes, how old were you when you stopped?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_numberYearsSmoking
elements.title: How many years have you or did you smoke cigarettes?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_numberCigsDayNow
elements.title: On average, how many cigarettes do you smoke per day now? (There are 20 cigarettes in a pack.)

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_numberCigsDayLife
elements.title: On average, over the entire time that you smoked, how many cigarettes did you smoke each day? (There are 20 cigarettes in a pack.)

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_everSmokedBidi
elements.title: Have you ever smoked a traditional “bidi” (“beedi”, “biri”), even one or two puffs?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_smokeBidiNow
elements.title: Do you now smoke bidis…

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_eNicotineEver
elements.title: Have you ever used an electronic nicotine product, even one or two times? (Electronic nicotine products include e-cigarettes, vape pens, hookah pens, personal vaporizers and mods, e-cigars, e-pipes, and e-hookahs.)

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_eNicotineNow
elements.title: Do you now use electronic nicotine products…

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_cigarEver
elements.title: Have you ever smoked a traditional cigar, cigarillo, or filtered cigar, even one or two puffs?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_cigarNow
elements.title: Do you now smoke a traditional cigar, cigarillo, or filtered cigar…

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_hookahEver
elements.title: Have you ever smoked tobacco in a hookah or shisha, even one or two puffs?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_hookahNow
elements.title: Do you now smoke tobacco in a hookah or shisha…

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_smokelessTobaccoEver
elements.title: Have you ever used smokeless tobacco products, even one or two times? (Smokeless tobacco products include paan with tobacco products, dip, spit, and chewing tobacco.)

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_smokelessTobaccoNow
elements.title: Do you now use smokeless tobacco products…

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyleDrinkingIntro
elements.html:
Drinking Alcohol

The next questions will ask about drinking alcohol. This includes coolers, beer, wine, champagne, liquor such as tequila, whiskey, rum, gin, vodka, scotch, or liqueurs, and also any other type of alcohol. This will help researchers better understand how alcohol affects health. As always, your answers are private.

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_everHadADrink
elements.title: In your entire life, have you had at least 1 drink of any kind of alcohol, not counting small tastes or sips? (By a “drink,” we mean a can or bottle of beer, a glass of wine or a wine cooler, a shot of liquor, or a mixed drink with liquor in it.)

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_drinkInLastYear
elements.title: How often did you have a drink containing alcohol in the past year?

choices.text: Two to four times a month
Two to three times a week
Four or more times a week

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_drinksInADay
elements.title: On a typical day when you drink, how many drinks do you have?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_sixDrinksInOccasion
elements.title: How often did you have six or more drinks on one occasion in the past year?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyleSubstancesIntro
elements.html:
Other Substances

Now we’d like to ask you about your experiences with medicines and other kinds of drugs. Some of the substances we’ll talk about are prescribed by a doctor (like pain medications). We only want to know if you have taken them for reasons or in doses other than prescribed. We understand that these are sensitive questions. You may choose not to answer them. However, by providing answers, you are helping researchers better understand how these substances affect health.

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_substanceUse
elements.title: In your LIFETIME, which of the following substances have you ever used?

choices.text: Marijuana (cannabis, pot, grass, hash, weed, bhaang, etc.)
Prescription stimulants for non-medical reasons (Ritalin, Concerta, Dexedrine, Adderall, diet pills, etc.)
Other stimulants (methamphetamine, speed, crystal meth, ice, k2/spice, bath salts, etc.)
Inhalants (nitrous oxide, glue, gas, paint thinner, etc.)
Sedatives or sleeping pills for non-medical reasons (Valium, Serepax, Ativan, Xanax, Librium, Rohypnol, GHB, etc.)
Hallucinogens (LSD, acid, mushrooms, PCP, Special K, ecstasy, etc.)
Prescription opioids for non-medical reasons (fentanyl, oxycodone [OxyContin, Percocet], hydrocodone [Vicodin], methadone, buprenorphine, etc.)

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_marijuana3mos
elements.title: In the PAST THREE MONTHS, how often have you used marijuana (cannabis, pot, grass, hash, bhaang, etc.)?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_cocaine3mos
elements.title: In the PAST THREE MONTHS, how often have you used cocaine (coke, crack, etc.)?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_prescriptionStimulants3mos
elements.title: In the PAST THREE MONTHS, how often have you used prescription stimulants for non-medical reasons (Vyvanse, Ritalin, Concerta, Dexedrine, Adderall, diet pills, etc.)

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_otherStimulants3mos
elements.title: In the PAST THREE MONTHS, how often have you used other stimulants (methamphetamine, speed, crystal meth, ice, k2/spice, bath salts, etc.)

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_inhalants3mos
elements.title: In the PAST THREE MONTHS, how often have you used inhalants (nitrous oxide, glue, gas, paint thinner, etc.)

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_sedatives3mos
elements.title: In the PAST THREE MONTHS, how often have you used sedatives or sleeping pills for non-medical reasons (Valium, Serepax, Ativan, Xanax, Librium, Rohypnol, GHB, etc.)?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_hallucinogens3mos
elements.title: In the PAST THREE MONTHS, how often have you used hallucinogens (LSD, acid, mushrooms, PCP, Special K, ecstasy, etc.)

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_streetOpioids3mos
elements.title: In the PAST THREE MONTHS, how often have you used street opioids (heroin, opium, etc.)?

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_prescriptionOpioids3mos
elements.title: In the PAST THREE MONTHS, how often have you used prescription opioids for non-medical reasons (fentanyl, oxycodone [OxyContin, Percocet], hydrocodone [Vicodin], methadone, buprenorphine, etc.)

elements.name: hd_hd_lifestyle_otherDrugs3mos
elements.title: In the PAST THREE MONTHS, how often have you used other drugs?
